entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the person who will be staying in the room with Harry.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student who is leaving the dormitory before Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is concerned about Seamus staying in the room with him.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a student who tries to reassure Harry but is unable to say exactly what Seamus is.

entities.name: nevile
entities.description: Neville gives Harry a look suggesting that it's his problem not theirs.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron also gives Harry a similar look.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione asks Harry what's the matter and notices that he looks absolutely terrible.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Seamus staying in the room with him.
Dean tries to reassure Harry that Seamus is just a normal person.
Neville gives Harry a look suggesting that it's his problem not theirs.
Ron also gives Harry a similar look.
Hermione notices that Harry looks absolutely terrible and asks him what's the matter.
